Career Objective

knowledge can be utilized and to be associated with an organization where is an opportunity 
to share, contributed and upgrade my knowledge for the development of self and. 
Organization.

mailings.
Job Responsibility
Working knowledge of all instruments measurement(As: Height gauge,c.t

Cosmetic standard check in lens.
Alignment issue check.
Coating issue check .
Tint issue check.  
Lens fitting in the frame.
All lens power measurement.
 Calculation in the lens.
Base check in all blank & radius.
Experience_
Page 4.5 Years Experience in GKB RX Lens Pvt. Ltd. (VISION RX LAB) 
Gurgaon Haryana as a Executive Quality Check  since 13/10/2011 to 
15/05/2015.
Now working in Lenskart.com as a Executive Quality Check since 
01/06/2015 to till date.
M/s GKB Rx Lens Pvt. Ltd is an ISO 14001:1989 Certified Company .It is a
lens  Manufacturing  Company.  It  is  exporting  to  Malaysia  ,Singapore,
Europe, Germany ,Holland ,Australia ,Gambia ,Thailand others countries.
Documentation of DPR and Rework Files.
Believe in Team work.
Adjustable in all Invironment.
Ability of understanding the problems

Hard Working.
